title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
eventually find yourself at the Moonfrsie Towers where you will subsequently begin the main quest: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers.

We reached Moonrise Towers. It seems unlikely that a high-value asset like Grand Duke Ravengard would be confined with other prisoners; the deeper we delve into the towers, the closer we'll be to finding him.

Move through this location and you will only be able to see the Grand Duke from a cutscene when you enter the Mind Flayer Colony past the Barracks and the doors t
